title: Breaking up, No Joke - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Childcare   Childish Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Children   Indecisive Protagonist   Kidnappings   Lack of Common Sense   Long Separations   Love Rivals   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mpreg   Selfish Protagonist   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: Taro Milk Tea   香芋奶茶
description:
The most fucked-up separation in the world, is that there is a baby in your belly when you break up with someone.

Bo Yu draws on his cigarette, slowly puffing out the smoke, and looks at the little boy lying in bed with deep eyes.

Two years later, he finally comes back.>
